Here is a list of all struct and union fields with links to the structures/unions they belong to:

- g -

  • gammaCorrection : _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3
  • gammaRamp : _NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION

  • gammaRamp8 : _NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION
